Utilisation : 

Please create a bdd.json file

Interior of the file (bdd.json) :
`{}`

```//requierements  
const client = new Discord.Client()  
const Discord = require('discord.js')  
const bdd = require('./bdd.json')  
const Save = require('discord-bosey')
const PremiumCode = "premium code"

//Command to activate the premium  
client.on('message', async message => {
    if (message.content.startsWith('!premium ' + PremiumCode)){
        message.channel.send('premium activÃ©')
        function Save() {
            fs.writeFileSync("./bdd.json", JSON.stringify(bdd, null, 4));
        }
        
            bdd[message.guild.id]["premium-mode"] = true
            Save()

    }
    })

//Command with the premium  
client.on('message', async message => {  
    if (message.content.startsWith('!cmdpremium')){  
        if (!bdd[message.guild.id]["premium-mode"] == true) {  
            return message.channel.send('Premium not activated!')  
        }  
            if (bdd[message.guild.id]["premium-mode"] == true) {  
                message.channel.send('Premium well activated !')  
        }  
  
    
    }  
})
